channel.title: DOM XSS on Vaishnav Baraskar
channel.description: Recent content in DOM XSS on Vaishnav Baraskar

item.title: Silent Payloads: DOM-Based XSS in PayPal’s Checkout
item.description: How an insecure implementation of postMessage in PayPal’s checkout system exposed users to DOM-based cross-site scripting, and what it teaches us about client-side message handling and trust boundaries.
